compliant.section: Fulfill and manage your orders . We may use your information to fulfill and manage your orders, payments, returns, and exchanges made through the Website
compliant.legal provisions: processing is necessary for the performance of a contract

compliant.section: Administer prize draws and competitions . We may use your information to administer prize draws and competitions when you elect to participate in our competitions
compliant.legal provisions: data subject has given consent to the processing

compliant.section: To deliver and facilitate delivery of services to the user . We may use your information to provide you with the requested service
compliant.legal provisions: processing is necessary for the performance of a contract

compliant.section: To respond to user inquiries/offer support to users . We may use your information to respond to your inquiries and solve any potential issues you might have with the use of our Services
compliant.legal provisions: processing is necessary for the performance of a contract

compliant.section: We will not use identifiable personal information without your consent
compliant.legal provisions: lawful, fair and transparent processing; purpose limitation

compliant.section: Consent:We may process your data if you have given us specific consent to use your personal information for a specific purpose
compliant.legal provisions: data subject has given consent to the processing

compliant.section: Performance of a Contract:Where we have entered into a contract with you, we may process your personal information to fulfill the terms of our contract
compliant.legal provisions: processing is necessary for the performance of a contract

compliant.section: Legal Obligations:We may disclose your information where we are legally required to do so in order to comply with applicable law, governmental requests, a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process, such as in response to a court order or a subpoena (including in response to public authorities to meet national security or law enforcement requirements)
compliant.legal provisions: processing is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation

compliant.section: Vital Interests:We may disclose your information where we believe it is necessary to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding potential violations of our policies, suspected fraud, situations involving potential threats to the safety of any person and illegal activities, or as evidence in litigation in which we are involved
compliant.legal provisions: processing is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the controller or by a third party

compliant.section: Business Transfers . We may share or transfer your information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company
compliant.legal provisions: processing is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the controller or by a third party

non_compliant.section: For other business purposes . We may use your information for other business purposes, such as data analysis, identifying usage trends, determining the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns and to evaluate and improve our Website, products, marketing and your experience . We may use and store this information in aggregated and anonymized form so that it is not associated with individual end users and does not include personal information
non_compliant.amend: While data analysis, usage trend identification, and marketing optimization are legitimate interests, the policy needs to explicitly state these interests and ensure they don't override the rights of individuals. Additionally, it should be clarified how 'aggregated and anonymized' data is handled to ensure it truly cannot be re-identified.

non_compliant.section: Legitimate Interests:We may process your data when it is reasonably necessary to achieve our legitimate business interests
non_compliant.legal provisions: processing is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the controller or by a third party
non_compliant.amend: The policy needs to specify the legitimate interests being pursued. Vague terms like 'legitimate business interests' are insufficient. Each purpose for data processing should be clearly identified and justified.

non_compliant.section: 3rdParty Analytics . We anonymize personally identifiable information prior to sending the data to 3rd Party Analytics like Google Analytics
non_compliant.legal provisions: definitions of personal data and anonymization
non_compliant.amend: The policy needs to clarify what anonymization techniques are used and if data is truly anonymized or merely pseudonymized. If pseudonymization is used, appropriate safeguards and legal grounds for processing should be detailed. Additionally, the third-party analytics providers should be listed, and users should be informed about their data processing practices and rights.
